name: Santa And The North Pole Strangler
name_original: Santa And The North Pole Strangler
description:
The reindeer are scared. They're refusing to deliver presents until Santa takes care of the threat. "Santa And The North Pole Strangler" is a short and sweet Christmas-themed bitsy game where you find several objects—a key, a poinsettia, and a cookie—and even run into the Strangler!

This is my first game.
